mapper.select: select a.userNo,b.establishmentName,b.companyName,b.companyScale,b.employeers,b.tax,b.files from Customer a, Corporation b where a.creditStatus=1 and a.managerclassification=0 and a.userNo = b.userNo order by receiptDate desc /* 신청 순서 */
mapper.update: update Corporation set score=#{score} where userNo=#{userNo}
